ValidationRule.description: When the Facility Account is Inactive, Product fields cannot be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (IsActive = False) && ( ( ISPICKVAL( Family , "Specific") && ISPICKVAL( Service_Type__c , "Acute (Daily)") )&& ( ISCHANGED( Name ) || ISCHANGED( Family ) || ISCHANGED( Service_Type__c ) || ISCHANGED( Description ) || ISCHANGED( Effective_year__c ) || ISCHANGED( Effective_Start_Date__c ) || ISCHANGED( Effective_End_Date__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Product is Deactivated and fields cannot be editable. Please Activate facility to edit these fields.
